snippet: In her new book, Reynolds puts the spotlight mostly on entertainers she has known and liked throughout the years.
abstract: Stephanie Zacharek reviews movie related books Make 'Em Laugh: Short-Term Memories of Longtime Friends by Debbie Reynolds with Dorian Hannaway, The Life and Times of Mickey Rooney by Richard A Lertzman and William J Birnes, David Lynch: The Man From Another Place by Dennis Lim, Wildflower by Drew Barrymore, Stuntwomen: The Untold Hollywood Story by Molly Gregory and The First King of Hollywood: The Life of Douglas Fairbanks by Tracey Goessel.
lead_paragraph: In her new book, Reynolds puts the spotlight mostly on entertainers she has known and liked throughout the years.

headline.main: Hollywood: Debbie Reynolds, Mickey Rooney, David Lynch and More
